price: “Onu babasından istemeye çalışacağız. Kuşkusuz bunu yapacağız.
arabic: قَالُواْ سَنُرَٰوِدُ عَنۡهُ أَبَاهُ وَإِنَّا لَفَٰعِلُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū sanurāwidu ʿanhu abāhu wa-innā lafāʿilūna
translations: We will try to get permission
